FuncDef: This command configures a lag-id associated to the Ethernet-Segment. When the Ethernet-Segment is configured asall-active,then only a lag or PW port can be associated to the Ethernet-Segment. When the Ethernet-Segment is configured assingle-active, then a lag, port or sdp can be associated to the Ethernet-Segment. In either case, only one of the four objects can be configured in the Ethernet-Segment. A specified lag can be part of only one Ethernet-Segment.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the lag-id associated with the Ethernet-Segment. Values-1 to 800.
